| [AzureSubscriptionBuilder](https://github.com/Azure-Samples/AzureSubscriptionBuilder) | The Azure Subscription Builder project allows an Enterprise Account owner to quickly deploy secure, policy compliant, Azure Subscriptions. Currently, a sample static web front end is defined as an option in this project. Since the solution leverages a RESTful HTTP trigger, you can bring your own front end such as a PowerApp or a Github Action. The second runbook called create-subscription creates the subscriptions and places them under the previously created management group.
